events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out soon to schedule the initial screening.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully, and the candidate showed strong software development skills.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess deeper engineering capabilities.
